title: Enhancing Teaching Methodology Practice Competencies: Virtual Reality-Based Collaborative Learning Program for Planetary Science

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Visualize and explain the planetary formation process in 3D within a VR environment.
Predict planetary evolution scenarios in asteroid collision simulations with 80% accuracy through collaborative problem-solving.
Systematically record experimental results in a digital science journal, share them with team members, and conduct at least three rounds of feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
